title: Yamaha Instructional Guitar Video
features: Guitar Basics for Electric and Acoustic Models. A 30-minute video that will teach you everything you need to know to keep your quitar in great playing condition! Includes a pamphlet featurning chords and easy songs to help you start playing today! A step-by-step:
* The parts of the elctric and acoustic quitar
* how to hold the guitar and the pick
* how to turn with an electric tuner, with a keyboard, and by ear
* how to change the strings * common chords * strumming patterns
description: Guitar Basics for Electric and Acoustic Models. This essential 30-minute video will teach you everything you need to know to keep your new guitar in great playing condition! Video shows: * The parts of the electric and acoustic guitar. * How to hold the guitar and the pick * How to tune with an electric tuner, with a keyboard, and by ear * How to change the strings * Common chords * Strumming patters Includes a pamphlet featuring chords and easy songs to help you start playing today.
